amendment.description: Amendment prohibits use of funds for the Missouri River Authorized Purposes Study (MRAPS).
amendment.purpose: An amendment to prohibit the use of funds for the study of the Missouri River Projects authorized in section 108 of the Energy and Water Development and Related Agencies Appropriation Act, 2009.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Luetkemeyer amendment (A057) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A057) offered by Mr. Luetkemeyer.
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Luetkemeyer amendment (A057) Agreed to by voice vote.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
